title: Assistant popup is full screen instead of a small overlay
content:
Recently, whenever I trigger the assistant by squeezing the sides, holding the home button, or swiping from the bottom corners (Android Q gesture), I get a full screen UI as shown in the image below, rather than the normal, small pop up with the "Hi, how can I help?" prompt and "Swipe up to see your updates" text. The only time I get the normal popup is when I press the assistant icon on the right of the home screen search bar, or when I swipe and hold from the bottom corners.

I am currently on Android Q Beta 6, however this issue was present while I was on Android P. I have tried uninstalling all updates and reinstalling, joining the beta and leaving, and clearing the cache.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
